Plot: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.
Title: The Interview
Actors: James Franco, Seth Rogen, Lizzy Caplan, Randall Park
Writer: Dan Sterling (screenplay), Seth Rogen (story), Evan Goldberg (story), Dan Sterling (story)
